result.execSummary:
The defendant Ronald W Grovogel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.  Defendant must pay all outstanding fees and court obligations.  If supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.
Alcohol assessment and follow through with recommendations. No alcohol, random UA's at discretion of agent.

Drug assessment and follow through with recommendations. No controlled substances, random UA's at discretion of agent.  Do not associate with any known drug dealers or users.  Defendant may only take medication pursuant to a prescription.

No contact with the victim until Domestic Violence couseling is complete, and then only with consent of agent and victim. Counseling, treatment, services as deemed appropriate by agent, including Domestic Violence counseling, Cognitive Intervention and psychological evaluation. Defendant must obey all rules and regulations of probation.  Firearm warning given.  Voting prohibited until sentence is complete and civil rights have been restored.
AMENDED JUNE 20, 2017  No contact amended to NO VIOLENT CONTACT

Defendant Ronald W Grovogel in court with attorney Donald L. Conner.  Defendant Ronald W Grovogel in custody.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
Upon plea to Ct 3 in 15CF908, the State recommends 3 yrs WPS bifurcated as 18/18, Ct 1 in 15CF873, Ct 2 is DRI. The State recommends 1 yr probation and in 15CF1039, deft will plead to Ct 1, Cts 2 & 3 are DRI. State recommends consecutive probation.

BTC: guilty as above. PSI ordered  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant joins in the request of the poster and the State does not object.

BTC: Bond to be converted back to cash, same terms and conditions as previously ordered. Cash to be returned to the poster.

allowing Ms. Paul to withdraw

Defendant Ronald W Grovogel in court with attorney Wendy S. Paul.  Defendant Ronald W Grovogel in custody.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Marilyn Leedle.
Ms. Paul indicates that deft has asked Ms. Paul to withdraw. The Court conducts a colloquy with the defendant.

BTC: Ms. Paul may withdraw. SPD to reappoint. The Court reminds deft that he is not able to choose his own attorney if his attorney is appointed.  Status conference scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ronald W Grovogel in court with attorney Wendy S. Paul.  Defendant Ronald W Grovogel in custody.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
Defense indicates that deft would like additional time to consider the offer and asks for a status in 30 days. Defense asks that the deft be allowed to participate in the alc/cs program in RCJ. Defense asks that bond in 15CF873 be increased so deft can get credit.

BTC: Increase bond in 15CF873 by $100.00. All conditions remain as previously ordered  Status conference scheduled for October 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ronald W Grovogel in court with attorney Wendy S. Paul.  Defendant Ronald W Grovogel in custody.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
Defense indicates that deft can post a total of $2,500.00 cash as well as a friend, Lisa Busby DOB 7-15-1967 that is willing to co-sign a bond for deft. The Court conducts colloquy with the potential co-signer to ensure she understands the gravity of her potential actions. The State strenuously objects to bond modification in these files - argument put on the record.

BTC: bond modification is denied if there is no in patient treatment program  Status conference scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
ATTY Paul files motion for modification of bond.

NG plea entered.
